title: 1982 Car Accident on South Boulevard
description: A police officer inspects the wreckage of an automobile collision at South Boulevard and Old Pineville Road. The damaged vehicle, a 1982 Chevrolet, is shown with significant damage to the side and rear. A fire truck is parked nearby, and an AM-VETS pick-up truck is visible in the background. Notations indicate the accident occurred at 11:50 a.m., involving a 17-year-old driver who unfortunately passed away shortly after.
